newsitem.title: USA: Coach USA to buy companies, offer notes.
newsitem.headline: Coach USA to buy companies, offer notes.

text.p: Coach USA Inc on Tuesday said it was preparing to buy several motorcoach businesses and to offer $100 million of senior notes.
The company said it had entered into definitive agreements to acquire motorcoach businesses with $49 million in annual revenues.
It said it had closed deals with Gray Line operations in Fort Lauderdale and Orlando, Florida; Van Nortwick Bros Inc in New Jersey; and America Charters Inc in Charlotte, North Carolina.
The company, which provides motorcoach tours, charters and other services, said it was waiting for regulatory approval for its acquisition of Trentway-Wagar Inc in Peterborough, Ontario.
Coach USA also said it planned to offer $100 million in senior subordinated notes due 2007.
It said it would use the proceeds to repay senior outstanding debt under its revolving credit agreement.
